name: Rush 'Hower
summary:
Jessie Trucker (aka J.T.) is the best at trucking. J.T. just wants to go home to Las Vegas with some Colorado love... But when J.T. runs into ski rush hour in the icy mountains of Colorado, putting on the brakes leads to Just Trouble!
How far can J.T. make it down the treacherous, never-ending windy roads of Eisenhower Pass without meeting a terrible end?
